review: Great all round service. Helped apply for my trademark and then protect it from infringements. Would highly recommend
Alex was great! Sorted everything I needed to trademark my business - would definitely recommend! Thank you Alex :)

For someone starting up my own brand for the very first time they made it really easy and did alot of the work for me. Communication was very good and kept me upto date with everything. Very professional
I have used the Trademark Helpline sevreal times now for their services. Always a pleasure to work with the team. Great communications and service throughout. Would recommend.
We were unsure about how to go about the process of trademarking. We found the advice and guidance of The Trademark Helpline just what we needed to get started!
Had to get a trademark done for a couple of our companies with these guys and they're super quick and easy to use. The ongoing service is invaluable would recommend them thoroughly.
